meta.title: Lan Read — Your first AI-powered reading companion
meta.description: Lan Read turns ePub/txt into a conversational mentor on iOS and iPadOS: instant summaries, skimming, ask-while-reading, optional iCloud sync and Notion export, privacy-first local storage.

hero.title: Your first AI-powered reading companion
hero.subtitle: Import ePub or text, open to see AI summaries, skim chapters fast, and ask questions as you read. Local-first by default with optional iCloud sync and Notion export.

vision: Make every book a conversational mentor so you understand, remember, and discuss faster.

facts.label: Export
facts.value: Notion export for highlights and bookmarks

features.title: Features

items.title: Local Book Import
items.body: Bring your own ePub or .txt from Files or iCloud Drive; keep your library local.

items.title: Instant AI Summaries
items.body: Open a book to see a concise overview and chapter structure with caching and manual refresh.

items.title: Skimming Mode
items.body: Chapter skeleton summaries with quick navigation for fast context building.

items.title: Ask While Reading
items.body: Ask about selected text, a chapter, or the whole book—explain, translate, or give examples; selection shortcuts are planned.

items.title: Reader Essentials
items.body: TOC, search, bookmarks, highlights, annotations, themes, adjustable fonts and line spacing, night mode.

items.title: Sync & Export
items.body: Optional CloudKit sync across devices plus Notion export for bookmarks and highlights.

items.title: Comprehension Checks (planned)
items.body: Diagnostics and quizzes to test recall are designed and planned.

features.privacyNote: No required signup. Library stays local; cloud sync, secure key exchange, and AI calls remain opt-in.

steps.title: Import
steps.body: Add ePub or text files from Files or iCloud Drive.

steps.title: Summarize
steps.body: Open a book to get the AI overview and chapter skeleton; results are cached for reuse.

steps.title: Read & Ask
steps.body: Highlight to ask, translate, or get examples while reading; selection shortcuts are planned.

steps.title: Sync / Export
steps.body: Turn on iCloud sync when you want and export highlights/bookmarks to Notion.

privacy.title: Privacy & sync
lines: Local-first by default; your library stays on device unless you enable cloud features.
Optional CloudKit sync and FastAPI key exchange keep credentials off the client while still anonymizing requests where possible.
No required registration. AI prompts avoid sending account identifiers; telemetry is minimal and focused on reliability.
